name: Lost Dog (Blockhead Maniac, Buyana114, Soninho dev)
name_original: Lost Dog (Blockhead Maniac, Buyana114, Soninho dev)
description:
WARNING: GAME IS MIGHT BE BROKEN! Story:

It's night in a quiet town and your parents went to dinner and told you to be responsible until they came back at 10:00 on the phone. While talking they ask about the dog.  You seeing the dog is missing, Panicked, tells them he's fine. You found out that your dog escaped your house and now you must look for it. You don't have much time before your parents come back, so you go around town looking for your dog. You can ask people if they saw it, but it will cost you time. You have a flashlight to guide you around, but it will run out of power, so you need to go gas stations or markets and get new batteries which will cost time.

How to play:

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Press 'F' to turn On or Off your flash light. 'X' to bring up the Pause menu. 

Run into people to start a conversation, press Space to talk to continue a conversation. 

Find your Dog before The time gets to 10:00 and make sure your dog follows you home. Go to gas stations or markets to recharge your flash light battery. 

Credits:

Programmer: Blockhead Maniac

Composer: Buyana114

Artist: Soninho dev

Thank you, Hope you enjoy!
